statements: SELECT * FROM BillingCalculations WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, energy_consumed FROM BillingCalculations WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT customer_id, energy_consumed, tariff_rate FROM BillingCalculations WHERE tariff_rate < 0.15;
SELECT energy_consumed, tariff_rate, customer_id FROM BillingCalculations WHERE customer_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT energy_consumed, tariff_rate FROM BillingCalculations WHERE energy_consumed BETWEEN 50 AND 150;
SELECT * FROM BillingCalculations WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT energy_consumed, tariff_rate FROM BillingCalculations WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM BillingCalculations GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_energy_consumed > 500 ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(tariff_rate) AS avg_tariff_rate FROM BillingCalculations GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(tariff_rate) > 0.05 ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM BillingCalculations WHERE energy_consumed BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY tariff_rate ASC, customer_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT consumer_id, consumption_amount FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY consumption_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM tariff_rates WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT consumer_id, SUM(consumption_amount) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY consumer_id;
SELECT MAX(energy_rate) AS max_energy_rate FROM tariff_rates WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumer_id = 100 ORDER BY consumption_date DESC
SELECT consumer_id, SUM(consumption_amount) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY consumer_id
SELECT consumer_id, SUM(consumption_amount) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY consumer_id HAVING total_consumption > 500
SELECT ec.consumer_id, ec.consumption_amount, tr.energy_rate FROM energy_consumption ec JOIN tariff_rates tr ON ec.consumer_id = tr.tariff_id
SELECT ec.consumer_id, ec.consumption_date, tr.start_date, tr.end_date FROM energy_consumption ec JOIN tariff_rates tr ON ec.consumer_id = tr.tariff_id ORDER BY ec.consumption_date ASC
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, energy_usage, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY energy_usage ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_cost) AS total_billing FROM BillingHistory GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM TariffRates WHERE tariff_rate BETWEEN 0.05 AND 0.1 ORDER BY tariff_rate DESC;
SELECT customer_id, energy_usage, billing_date FROM BillingHistory WHERE billing_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY energy_usage DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY energy_usage DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_energy_usage DESC
SELECT customer_id, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC

SELECT BillingHistory.customer_id, BillingHistory.total_cost, TariffRates.tariff_name FROM BillingHistory LEFT JOIN TariffRates ON BillingHistory.tariff_id = TariffRates.id WHERE BillingHistory.total_cost > 200 ORDER BY BillingHistory.total_cost ASC

SELECT * FROM BillingHistory JOIN EnergyConsumption ON BillingHistory.customer_id = EnergyConsumption.customer_id WHERE BillingHistory.total_cost < 500 AND EnergyConsumption.energy_usage > 50 ORDER BY BillingHistory.billing_date DESC, EnergyConsumption.energy_usage DESC
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT energy_consumed, energy_cost FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT user_id, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT tariff_name FROM TariffRates;
SELECT username, address, email FROM Users WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, energy_cost FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY energy_consumed ASC, energy_cost DESC;

SELECT Users.username, BillingHistory.billing_date, EnergyConsumption.energy_consumed, TariffRates.rate FROM Users JOIN BillingHistory ON Users.id = BillingHistory.user_id JOIN EnergyConsumption ON Users.id = EnergyConsumption.user_id JOIN TariffRates ON TariffRates.energy_type = 'electricity';
SELECT Users.username, sum(BillingHistory.total_cost) AS total_billing FROM Users JOIN BillingHistory ON Users.id = BillingHistory.user_id GROUP BY Users.username HAVING total_billing > 500;
SELECT * FROM TariffRates WHERE rate BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.5 ORDER BY rate DESC, tariff_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY consumption_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(consumption_value) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, total_cost FROM customers INNER JOIN billing_records ON customers.customer_id = billing_records.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption_value > 1000 ORDER BY consumption_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_cost FROM customers INNER JOIN billing_records ON customers.customer_id = billing_records.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, payment_date, amount FROM customers INNER JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
